text: Ian Robert Maxwell (born Ján Ludvík Hyman Binyamin Hoch; 10 June 1923 – 5 November 1991), was a British media proprietor, Member of Parliament (MP), and fraudster. He was known for his publishing companies. After his death, huge difference in numbers in his companies' finances were revealed, including his fraudulent actions on Mirror Group pension fund. In 1991, his body was discovered floating in the Atlantic Ocean, having fallen overboard from his yacht. He was buried in Jerusalem. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Accidental deaths by drowning Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:UK MPs 1964–1966 Category:UK MPs 1966–1970 Category:British publishers Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Robert Maxwell
